function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Failure to prioritize human health in sustainability goals","Impact":"Increased public health issues and failure to achieve sustainable development","Mitigation":"Integrating human health as a core pillar of sustainability goals","Technologies":"Health monitoring and surveillance systems","People":"Global population and public health organizations","Owner":"Policy makers and international organizations"},{"Description":"Global pandemic as a result of neglecting public health","Impact":"Widespread disease outbreaks and global health crises","Mitigation":"Investing in public health infrastructure and preventive measures","Technologies":"Vaccines, telemedicine, and infectious disease tracking systems","People":"Global population and healthcare workers","Owner":"Governments and healthcare organizations"},{"Description":"Separation of health from other sustainability goals","Impact":"Undermining the critical role of health in overall sustainability","Mitigation":"Integration of health considerations into all sustainability initiatives","Technologies":"Data analytics for health impact assessment","People":"Policy makers, public health advocates","Owner":"Government agencies and international bodies"}]}
